/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The street itself is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. A few people can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
